alert.note: Alert for Sangamon (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Flood Watch issued July 10 at 5:04AM CDT until July 13 at 5:30AM CDT by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: * WHAT...Flash flooding caused by upstream dam release release is possible. * WHERE...A portion of central Illinois, including the following county, Sangamon. * WHEN...Through Monday morning. * IMPACTS...This release of water will cause rapid rises on Sugar Creek, downstream of the dam. Rapid flooding of low lying areas along the creek will result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood The Flash Flood Watch has expired for a portion of central Illinois, including the following county, Sangamon.
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action should Flash Flood Warnings be issued.
